casebody.data:
DOYLE et al. v. O’BRIEN, CHIEF OF POLICE OF SOMERVILLE, et al. No. 1123,

Misc.

Decided January 12, 1970 Edward J. Duggan for appellants. Robert H. Quinn, Attorney General of Massachusetts, John Wall, Assistant Attorney General, and Lawrence P. Cohen, Deputy Assistant Attorney General, for appellees. Per Curiam.

The motion to affirm is granted and the judgment is affirmed.
